member.name: T:System.Numerics.Plane
member.summary: A plane.
member.remarks: The Plane structure represents a plane using a 3D vector normal and a distance value.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a Plane from 4 floats.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.#ctor(System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a Plane from a Vector3 and a distance.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.#ctor(System.Numerics.Vector4)
member.summary: Creates a Plane from a Vector4.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.CreateFromVertices(System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a Plane from a set of three vertex positions, which must all be different and not in a straight line.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Normalize(System.Numerics.Plane)
member.summary: Changes the coefficients of the normal vector of a plane to make it of unit length.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Transform(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Matrix4x4)
member.summary: Transforms a normalized plane by a Matrix4x4.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Transform(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Quaternion)
member.summary: Transforms a normalized plane by a quaternion rotation.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Dot(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Vector4)
member.summary: Calculates the dot product of a plane with a Vector4.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.DotCoordinate(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary: Calculates the dot product of a plane with a Vector3 coordinate. Unlike DotNormal, this computation includes the plane D value.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.DotNormal(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary: Calculates the dot product of a plane with a Vector3 normal. Unlike DotCoordinate, this computation ignores the plane D value.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.op_Equality(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Plane)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances of Plane are equal.
member.remarks: Uses an exact floating point equality comparison, which is not advised if the values being compared are the result of computations which could have introduced floating point precision errors.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.op_Inequality(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Plane)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances of Plane are not equal.
member.remarks: Uses an exact floating point equality comparison, which is not advised if the values being compared are the result of computations which could have introduced floating point precision errors.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Equals(System.Numerics.Plane)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Plane is equal to the Plane.
member.remarks: Uses an exact floating point equality comparison, which is not advised if the values being compared are the result of computations which could have introduced floating point precision errors.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the Plane.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.ToString
member.summary: Returns a String that represents the current Plane.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets the hash code for this object.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.op_Implicit(System.Numerics.Plane)~Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Plane
member.summary: Converts a System.Numerics.Plane to a Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Plane.
member.remarks: This allows application code to use the rich System.Numerics math types, then pass these objects directly to WinRT APIs that use the WinRT structs from Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.op_Implicit(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Plane)~System.Numerics.Plane
member.summary: Converts a Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Plane to a System.Numerics.Plane.
member.remarks: This allows application code to use the rich System.Numerics math types, and assign to these objects directly from the return values of WinRT APIs that use the WinRT structs from Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Plane.Normal
member.summary: Normal vector of the plane.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Plane.D
member.summary: Distance of the plane along its normal from the origin.
